task.title: Unlocking an Object from a Request
task.shortdesc: If you have a locked object in CWRC users can request that you unlock it, so that they can make changes to the object (see Requesting a release of object lock). If you do not want to unlock the object, ignore the request or send the user a notification in CWRC.

taskbody.context: You must be logged in to CWRC for the email link to work.

step.cmd: If you would like to unlock the object for this user, click on the link in the email.
step.info: Users receive the unlock request through email (the one you used to sign up to CWRC).
If you unlock this object, it will be available for editing by any CWRC member.

step.cmd: Click on Confirm to unlock the object.
step.info: When you approve the release of a lock, the member who requested it will be informed in the CWRC notification system.
